Topics.Title: Registration on the forum
Topics.Text: Dear visitors of the forum! In order to register on the forum, write a registration request to the address rybovody@gmail.com. In the request, specify the username under which you are going to register. Specify a more or less intelligible login, and not a confusing set of characters . A request for registration by mail is mandatory, without a request with a login, users will not be activated. Within 24 hours after the request, you must register, Otherwise, access to registration will be closed. This is a compulsory measure to combat spam bots.

Topics.Title: High quality compound feed for RAS
Topics.Text: We have begun to produce our own high-quality compound feed for RAS in terms of composition and nutritional value, which is not inferior to foreign counterparts on the Ukrainian market, while its price is 25% lower than these analogs. The compound feed is made of top quality components and is balanced in amino acids. , minerals, vitamin composition and other indicators. The composition of our feed contains more than 20 components. We make compound feed for Clarius catfish, sturgeon, tilapia, trout, carp. At the moment we are making only sinking feed, but soon we will make floating.Link to a video about our compound feed https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=heR977StrN4 To date, the current price of compound feed:Clarium catfish - 32 UAH / kg Cherry catfish - 39 UAH / kg Tilapia - 25 UAH / kg Carp - 14 - 18 UAH / kg Trout - 41 UAH / kg For the purchase of compound feed, write in a personal or email: rybovody@gmail.com Tel +380732894283

Topics.Title: Design and economic justification of RAS and other fish farms.
Topics.Text: Design of recirculating water systems, IDS, ponds and other fish farms. The design is carried out by specialized specialists who have the appropriate biological education and work experience. We also calculate the profitability of growing different types of fish in various fish farming systems and make an economic justification. for questions of design and economic justification of fish farms, contact the forum administrator Andrey in a personal message.

Topics.Title: Clarius catfish breeding experience
Topics.Text: I want to breed catfish. Heated pool 9m3. What power should be the pump liters per minute, uv sterilizer, and compressor.

Answers.Text: I want to breed catfish. Heated pool 9m3. What power should be the pump liters per minute, uv sterilizer, and compressor.

For a 9-cube pool, water exchange is needed, when growing clarius catfish, 4-5 cubic meters per hour. But as a rule, not all pumps correspond to the declared characteristics. Therefore, I recommend taking inexpensive pumps with a margin of 50 - 100% of its declared performance. One UV lamp is enough for 36 watts. well, and a compressor will be needed with a capacity of about 150 - 200 liters per minute and a pressure of at least 0.4 - 0.5 atmospheres.

This filler is very expensive for ultrasound. Which biofilter you choose yourself, it all depends on the principle of operation of the biofilter. The settler must be calculated according to the water flow - the water should be in a container for about 30 minutes for the sediment to settle. Not all suspensions are deposited from the clary catfish, since it secretes mucus that does not sink, so it is advisable to use a drum filter with a micro mesh.
the UV lamp should work constantly? For catfish what percentage of water change should and at what planting? What amount per ton will be the most optimal for keeping?

uranuran80 wrote: the UV lamp must constantly work? For catfish what percentage of water change should and at what planting? What amount per ton will be the most optimal for keeping? The UV lamp can be switched on cyclically, for example at night. More I do not recommend planting 200 kg per cube of water until the purification system is set up. The water change is calculated by the amount of feed and its protein component. Simplified, you can change about 10% per day with a tuned purification system.

Topics.Title: Profitability of growing Clarius catfish in RAS in Ukraine
Topics.Text: I am interested in this issue of growing clarius catfish in RAS in Ukraine, using the example of mini RAS for 10 m3 of water. More specifically, I would like to compare the cost of electricity, water, heating the greenhouse and water in winter and feed. On the Internet a lot of theory about this, but theory is theory and practice is practice

Answers.Text: I am interested in this issue of growing clarius catfish in RAS in Ukraine, using the example of mini RAS for 10 m3 of water. More specifically, I would like to compare the costs of electricity, water, heating of the greenhouse and water in winter and feed. On the Internet a lot of theory about this, but theory is theory and practice is practice

The prime cost mainly consists of feed costs. Feed costs are about 80%. In 10 cubic meters of water, about 10 tons of claria can be grown per year, although it all depends on the cyclicity of fish stocking. , but I take on average 10 tons per year. Here, of course, you will need tanks for rearing juveniles. So, approximately, consider the price of 1 kg of good feed, for example, Aller Aqua Primo Float, and multiply by 1.2 and get the approximate price of the cost of growing clary I repeat that this is an approximate estimate without taking into account the cost of the RAS equipment itself.
Thank you very much for such a prompt response

Topics.Title: Catfish growth
Topics.Text: Hello! Please tell me, how much does Clarium catfish gain a kilo for?

Answers.Text: Hello! Tell me please, how much does Clarium catfish take to gain a kilo?

It all depends on the conditions of keeping and, most importantly, on the feed. When using feed from well-known companies such as Coppens, Biomar, Aller Aqua, from 5 grams to 1 kilogram, the clarion catfish gains in about 4 months. As a rule, there are leaders who can to reach 1 kg in 3 months, but there are only such units.Accordingly, there are individuals lagging behind in growth, therefore, with an average indicator, it takes 4 months.Many factors can affect the growth of catfish.For example, Clary can easily get stressed and not eat for about 3 days.

Topics.Title: Catfish Jumps Out of the Pool
Topics.Text: 1-2 pieces jumps out to the top of the pool 200mm per day. Why could it be?

Answers.Text: up to the top of the pool 200mm for a day, 1-2 pieces jumps out. Why could it be?

If a fish does not like the habitat, then as a rule it tries to leave this habitat. Look for the reason that something is wrong with the water, or some gases, or impurities, or salt. Or maybe just sharp the change of habitat and the fish did not have time to get used to it.

Topics.Title: Transportation of fry and fish
Topics.Text: Tell me which shed of sturgeon fry is better transported and what equipment to use, for example, for transporting sturgeon fry in the amount of 100-200 pieces?

Answers.Text: Tell me which shed of sturgeon fry is better transported and what equipment to use, for example, to transport 100-200 sturgeon fry?

Take any container, preferably horizontal, or so that the height does not exceed the length of the container, fill it with water, preferably under the top so that it does not dangle inside the container, then connect the aquarium compressor through a 12/220 V car inverter to the 12 volt system of the car , connect the sprayer and lower it into the container, and safely transport the sturgeon fry at any distance. It is desirable that the water temperature does not exceed 15 - 18 degrees. In this way we transported 700 pieces of 1 gram sterlet in a 250 liter barrel over a distance of 250 km - we brought everyone alive. You can plant the fry in plastic bags with water, pump oxygen there and transport it at any distance. The water temperature should not exceed 14 - 15 degrees. Volume 50/50 water / oxygen.
What can you do if you need to transport it 3000 km?

First of all, everything strongly depends on the size of the mesh cell. The smaller the cell, the more the filtration area is needed. The drum is calculated exactly according to the filtration area and the size of the mesh cell. It is also important the pollution of the water, which is primarily determined by the fish stocking density and the amount of feed introduced. Topics.Title: Denitrifier
Topics.Text: Hello everyone, I have 40 nitrate, I do water changes every day, 15% a day, I tried to do 20 and 30% a day, the result does not change if less than 10% a day nitrites go off scale I decided to make a denitrification filter and put it is in front of a boiling-bed filter, in only one problem there is little information on it, and if it does not work properly, hydrogen sulfide can be released and poison the fish, help someone with calculations or advice or your own experience

Answers.Text: Hello everyone, I have 40 nitrate, I do water changes every day, 15% a day, I tried to do 20 and 30% a day, the result does not change if less than 10% a day nitrites go off scale I decided to make a denitrification filter and put it is in front of a boiling filter, in only one problem there is little information on it, and if it does not work properly, hydrogen sulfide can be released and poison the fish, help someone with calculations or advice or your own experience

Viktr123321 wrote: Hello everyone, I have 40 nitrites, I do water changes every day, 15% per day, I tried to do both 20 and 30% per day, the result does not change if less than 10% per day nitrites go off scale decided to make a denitrification filter and put it in front of a boiling-bed filter, in only one problem there is little information on it, and if it does not work properly, hydrogen sulfide can be released and poison the fish, help someone with calculations or advice or your experience The denitrifier is designed to decompose nitrates to gaseous nitrogen, and your nitrites are overestimated most of all due to the fact that the biofilter does not cope with the task at hand or simply does not have enough power.

Answers.Text: Hello Andrey. Please tell me how to calculate the biofilter, how much bioloading is needed m2 \ m3 and for how many fish?

The simplest calculation is that on average 1000 m / sq. Utilizes nitrogen compounds from 8 kg of feed per day, or 280 grams of ammonium, since 1 kg of feed with 45% protein gives 35 grams of ammonium into the water. That is, for 8 kg feed per day needs a useful area of ​​1000 sq / m. These are all approximate calculations, but they are quite applicable. Well, the biofilter itself is already calculated depending on what load you use.

Topics.Title: catfish feed

Answers.Text: is it possible to grow claria without purchased feed?
You can
You probably have some kind of feed recipe, from which it grows by leaps and bounds, can you make a video review or share with him in more detail here? Thanks for the answer!

Initially, I made feed from five components: 1 Fish meal 2 Wheat 3 Macukha 4 Feed yeast 5 Albumin (blood meal) In principle, the fish grew more or less - although not as fast as on Aller, but the cost price significantly decreased even with an increase in CC Subsequently, the recipe became more complicated to 9-12 components, but the cost remained within 9-13 grams per 1 kg, depending on how much you can buy the components. Right now I can't find the last recipe, I'll find it a little later, shoot a video and I'll post it on my channel and here on the forum.
Ok, thanks!

Today I shot a video on homemade feed and posted it on my channel. I give the composition of the last version of the compound feed, which was used for feeding the clary catfish. 1. Fish meal - 30% 2. Soybean meal - 26% 3. Sunflower meal - 20 % 4. Wheat flour - 8% 5. Barley flour - 5% 6. Feed yeast - 4% 7. Blood meal - 2% 8. Grass flour - 2% 9. Olia - 2% 10. Chalk - 1% 11. Vitamins 12. Cobalt chloride - 0.03% All this was mixed with water and brought to a pasty state, then passed through a meat grinder and dried. After drying, it was crushed to the state of granules and then fed to the fish.
Watched the video, thumbs up!
Thank you!

Topics.Title: Feeding the catfish.
Topics.Text: How much feed should be fed per day for 1 kg of fish?

Answers.Text: How much feed should you feed per 1 kg of fish per day?

It all depends on the age and size of the fish. With a weight of 1 gram per day, Claria is fed compound feed 5-7% of its weight, and with a weight of 1 kg, 1% of compound feed per day depends on its weight. This is averaged data, since everything depends even from the composition of the compound feed itself.
Good afternoon! Please tell me how many times a day you need to feed Clarius catfish? Thanks in advance.

It all depends on the total weight of the fish. In the net everything is spelled out in detail, google it. Also, on the quality of the feed, how many hours the fish turns it over and + the water temperature. The less weight, the more often, 5-10g (every 4 hours ), well, and further increases the gap. In general, to observe the behavior of the fish, how hungry they rush to feed and determine the time by yourself, if possible. Better not to feed a little than overfeeding.
Thank you very much for your reply.

Topics.Title: Overexposure of fish in uzv
Topics.Text: Good afternoon. For a long time I have been interested in this question, is it possible to overexpose common fish in fish fish systems - crucian carp, carp, silver carp, etc.? Without feeding. With a maximum landing area. can you get by with a pool, aerator and a sump? And how can you maintain the water temperature around +4 degrees in such a system?

Answers.Text: Good afternoon. I have long been interested in such a question, is it possible to overexpose common fish in fish fish systems - crucian carp, carp, silver carp, etc.? Without feeding. With a maximum planting area. can you get by with a pool, aerator and a sump? And how can you maintain the water temperature around +4 degrees in such a system?

For overexposure, it is not necessary to build an ultrasound system, a pool with aeration and a small water change is enough, about 1% per day, or even less. The temperature of +4 degrees can be maintained only by forced cooling, if in summer. And why 4 I think that even at 10 the fish will sit normally. It all depends on how long you need to overexpose. Carp and crucian carp will sit normally. But the silver carp in a confined space quickly loses its mobility, stiffens and becomes bent within a week - checked !!!

Daniel wrote: can you describe the principle of the airlift? Thank you. The pipe is lowered into the water and a sprayer is attached to the bottom of the pipe. Air is supplied to the sprayer, which, going up the pipe, raises the water upwards - this is the airlift.

Topics.Title: Flow system
Topics.Text: Good afternoon, gentlemen fish farmers! Please enlighten me purely technically! The point is that I want to create a flow-through system for the cultivation of marbled catfish in eurocubes (14-15 containers) without ozanizers, aerators and filters. It will simply drain from the containers into the sewer and add water from the well through a pump and a heat exchanger! Please tell me based on experience, the maximum planting density of catfish in a eurocube and the volume of water to be changed per day! It's just that I'm generally a complete deletant in this matter! Thank you

Topics.Title: Working Uzv. And how does it work?
Topics.Text: In August 2016, it launched its installation. The total volume of water is 20 m3. 3 pools 2x3x1.2, 45 plastic vegetable boxes with foam balls with a total volume of about 900 liters-irrigated filter, while the water is filtered by fishing nets, I change every a week, the drum filter is under construction. Aeration of water is not performed. After the nets, water enters the pit sump with a length of 4.5 and a depth of 1.3 and from it by a pump through UV lamps to an irrigated filter and into pools. In 1 pool there are about 200 kg of catfish , in the second 70 kg of sterlet, in the third the entire surface of the pool is occupied by eichornia. About 4 kg of feed per day. Nitrite is less than 0.1 by tests. Temperature is 27 degrees. The processes in my system are interesting. I plan to add a floating load to the sump.

Topics.Title: Deep processing of fish
Topics.Text: Who thought about the processing of fish and the production of products from it, who has experience in this business?

Answers.Text: Who thought about the processing of fish and the production of products from it, who has experience in this business?

Well, let's just say - for this you need FISH, but fish are already needed: processing technology, skills, equipment, premises and some other components. It all depends on the degree of processing. The simplest thing will probably be to smoke the fish, since for example dried clary catfish is nothing good. And smoked catfish is considered a huge delicacy. If you raise the issue of conservation, then the processing process itself becomes much more complicated, although at one time I closed silver carp and grass carp for myself 100 cans, but without sterilization such canned food do not last long.

in addition to smoking, you can also make smoked sausages with sturgeon with the addition of catfish and for grilling, by the way, I did not measure the proportions for myself, I took the sturgeon and the catfish, twisted it coarsely with salt and pepper and hammered it into the intestine, and it turned out delicious on the Mongal
I also know that at one enterprise we make catfish with unagi sauce and in sushi bars they push it under the name of eel-like clary

I watched one video on YouTube, in which there was a presentation of clarius catfish for sushi instead of eel. Against eel, clarius surpasses it in many parameters, but it does not yield to it in taste. There is more meat yield, and it turns out cheaper, and in processing is much easier and much more in favor of Claria.
